spec.name: FASTQFETCHER:SRA2FASTQ:SRA_PREFETCH ([SRR13255544, SRR36447178])
spec.script:
# Prefetch SRA data
    prefetch \
        [SRR13255544, SRR36447178] \
         --max-size 20G
    
    # Find and move SRA file to work directory
    # Prefetch typically creates: [SRR13255544, SRR36447178]/[SRR13255544, SRR36447178].sra or downloads to current directory
    if [ -f "[SRR13255544, SRR36447178]/[SRR13255544, SRR36447178].sra" ]; then
        mv "[SRR13255544, SRR36447178]/[SRR13255544, SRR36447178].sra" "./[SRR13255544, SRR36447178].sra"
    elif [ -f "[SRR13255544, SRR36447178].sra" ]; then
        # Already in current directory
        :
    else
        # Try to find the file
        find . -name "[SRR13255544, SRR36447178].sra" -type f -exec mv {} "./[SRR13255544, SRR36447178].sra" \;
    fi
    
    # Verify file exists
    if [ ! -f "[SRR13255544, SRR36447178].sra" ]; then
        echo "ERROR: SRA file [SRR13255544, SRR36447178].sra not found after prefetch" >&2
        exit 1
    fi
    
    # Get version information
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "FASTQFETCHER:SRA2FASTQ:SRA_PREFETCH":
        prefetch: $(echo $(prefetch --version) | sed -e "s/prefetch : //g" )
    END_VERSIONS
